market_size.total_addressable_market: All rental properties in Seattle area
market_size.serviceable_addressable_market: Rental properties matching user's criteria (e.g., price, size, pet-friendly)
market_size.serviceable_obtainable_market: Properties the user actively considers and tracks

direct_competitors.name: Online Rental Portals (Zillow, Apartments.com)
weaknesses: Data not persistent once listing is gone

differentiation_strategy.unique_selling_proposition: A personalized, structured system for tracking rental properties with integrated commute analysis and image management, tailored to specific user needs.
competitive_advantages: Customizable data fields for specific criteria (e.g., cat-friendly, parking type)
Integrated commute time tracking and visual route mapping
Centralized storage of property details and images, independent of listing availability
differentiation_strategy.positioning_statement: For individuals actively searching for rental properties, the Rental Property Tracker is a personalized web application that provides a structured and visual way to manage property details, commute information, and images, unlike generic note-taking apps or transient online listings.

market_trends.trend: Increasing demand for personalized data management
market_trends.impact: Users seek tools that adapt to their unique needs rather than generic solutions.

barriers_to_entry: Technical expertise required for setup and maintenance
Integration with external APIs (e.g., Google Maps) can be complex
